WW-Sprint","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2376650,"totalDownVotes":315106,"universeId":321778215,"name":"👻Royalloween👻 Royale High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":1399,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"High up on the hill sits a mysterious manor.. 
In celebration of your untimely visit, the Halloween festivities have been extended until Nov 15th!

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":595275,"totalDownVotes":129725,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars 🎃 [SEASON 2!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":1348,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4650028,"totalDownVotes":629429,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":933,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🏎 NASCAR is officially coming to Jailbreak SOON! Your life depends on it!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4328109,"creatorName":"Police Roleplay Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":440436,"totalDownVotes":37679,"universeId":903807016,"name":"👻 Emergency Response: Liberty County","placeId":2534724415,"playerCount":554,"imageToken":"T_2534724415_2677","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🎃 TRICK OR TREATING: On the civilian team, visit the houses to earn candy by trick or treating. Read the latest update log here: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/1520963","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1359723,"totalDownVotes":77171,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":678,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Lobby built by worthyshiningkazoo.","genre":""},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2635457,"totalDownVotes":281789,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 12!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":767,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K.","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":475581,"totalDownVotes":235798,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":447,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3672309,"totalDownVotes":362688,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":547,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.10.0
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":6556072,"creatorName":"Universe Time Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":456037,"totalDownVotes":75551,"universeId":1782832995,"name":"A Universal Time","placeId":5130598377,"playerCount":343,"imageToken":"T_5130598377_12c","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❗ Welcome to A Universal Time ❗
🔮A Universal Time (AUT) is an action/adventure game inspired by many different popular shows, games, and animes. Most notably the Shōnen Jump Anthology's 'JoJo's Bizarre Adventure'.

- NEW AURAS
- NEW EMOTES
- NEW DASH ANIMATION, VISUAL CHANGES, ETC
- A LOT OF FIXES AND BALANCES

🔊Sounds are sourced from a majority of open libraries and our sound designers. These can be removed upon legitimate request.🔊","genre":""},{"creatorId":7852889,"creatorName":"princeelf","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":158661,"totalDownVotes":34154,"universeId":2936087484,"name":"Hexa Game","placeId":7555007091,"playerCount":615,"imageToken":"T_7555007091_570","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"HONEYCOMB UPDATE

@princeelfdev

Premium Benefits: +500 starting Gems!","genre":""},{"creatorId":409640380,"creatorName":"MUCDICH","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":399058,"totalDownVotes":40231,"universeId":2294168059,"name":"[UPDATE] The Mimic 🎃","placeId":6243699076,"playerCount":412,"imageToken":"T_6243699076_ec39","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Survival Mode is being developed.
Book II is being developed.

CONTROLS:
Shift to Run for PC
L2 to Sprint for XBOX

ABOUT:  Four stories created from Japanese history and urban legends with a twist. In each book, you will find yourself as different characters venturing into the unknown depths of mysterious worlds.

WARNING: This game contains Flashing lights, Loud Noises & Jumpscares!


Join the group for updates and your support:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/9482918/CTStudio#!/about

This game is not based on the movie. It was coincidentally made with the same title.


For the best experience use headphones.

Lobby music by Piano Vampire

Tags: Horror, Abandoned, Lost, Mystery, Spooky, Terror, Scary, Creepy, Pineapples, School, Allergies, Japan.","genre":""},{"creatorId":6356872,"creatorName":"Jean's Bizarre Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":118877,"totalDownVotes":16401,"universeId":1998835206,"name":"item asylum","placeId":5670218884,"playerCount":402,"imageToken":"T_5670218884_c07a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"inspired by infinite welfare

a meme and reference filled randomizer fighting experience. can it get more chaotic?

how the experience works: every time you respawn, you get 3 random weapons: a melee (first slot) a ranged (second slot) and a miscellaneous (third slot). use these to fight others.

brought to you by JeanRBLX, PortABoi, and Xerroz","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3413673,"totalDownVotes":438626,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":267,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!
","genre":""},{"creatorId":4347428,"creatorName":"The State of Mind","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":365360,"totalDownVotes":136016,"universeId":767752328,"name":"💥 Super Power Training Simulator","placeId":2202352383,"playerCount":196,"imageToken":"T_2202352383_7d45","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💥 Welcome to Superpowers Training Simulator! 💥
👊🏻 Train your Fists and punch like Superman!
💪🏻 Train your Body and become Invincible!
✨ Train your mind to achieve psychic powers!
⚡️ Train your speed to the point of teleportation!
☄️ Take the path of Superhero or Supervillain!
🏆 Compete in Global Leaderboards, and much more!

📙 UPDATE LOG {V 1.7} 📙
- 🎃 Added Day & Night Cycle System!
- 🔥  Added Special Halloween NPCs Quests & Skills!
- ⚜️ Added Many Secret Training Areas!
- 🔰  Added New Auras & Skills Tier!
